about_acharya_desc_1: Acharya Ram Kishan Ji Joshi is a distinguished and knowledgeable scholar with deep knowledge of Vedic rituals and astrology. He has dedicated his life to promoting Sanatana Dharma and guiding people on their spiritual journey.
